text: Det Vilde Kor is the third full-length album by the Norwegian folk metal band Lumsk. It was released on February 26, 2007 by Tabu Recordings. The lyrics are taken from Knut Hamsun's similarly titled poetry collection of 1904. ==Track listing== # "Diset Kvæld" – 3:04Det vilde kor (1904) p. 107 archive.org # "Om Hundrede Aar er Alting glemt" – 6:31Det vilde kor (1904) p. 77 archive.org # "Høstnat" – 3:38Det vilde kor (1904) p. 43 archive.org # "Paa Hvælvet" – 2:50Det vilde kor (1904) p. 22 archive.org # "Lad Spille med Vaar over Jorden" – 3:22Det vilde kor (1904) p. 11 archive.org # "Duttens Vise" – 3:22Det vilde kor (1904) p. 58 archive.org # "Svend Herlufsens Ord, del I Min Kærest er som den" – 2:37Det vilde kor (1904) p. 84 archive.org # "Svend Herlufsens Ord, del II Og du vil vide" – 2:23 # "Svend Herlufsens Ord, del III Jeg har det" – 1:50 # "Svend Herlufsens Ord, del IV Se, Natten er Livet" – 4:35 # "Godnat Herinde" – 3:29Det vilde kor (1904) p. 80 archive.org # "Skærgaardsø" – 2:45Det vilde kor (1904) p. 31 archive.org ==Personnel== *Stine Mari Langstrand – Vocals *Vidar Berg – Drums *Ketil Sæther – Guitar *Espen Warankov Godø – Piano, Hammond, Synthesizer *Eystein Garberg – Guitar *Siv Lena Waterloo Laugtug – Violin *Espen Hammer – Bass Guitar ==Footnotes== Category:2007 albums Category:Lumsk albums
title: Det Vilde Kor (Lumsk)
